TEXT.TITLE: KINCAID FURNITURE <KNCD.O> REPURCHASES SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Kincaid Furniture Co Inc said its board has authorized the repurchase of up to 100,000 of its common shares, or a 2.9 pct interest, in the open market or privately from time to time. Reuter
